item.title: Arbitrary Curve Fitting
item.description:
+++ date = 2021-11-20T00:00:00+00:00 title = “Arbitrary Curve Fitting” slug = “arbitrary_curve” categories = [ “Machine Learning”, “Statistics”, “Math” ] tags = [ “Machine Learning”, “Statistics”, “Perceptron”, “Polynomials” ] headline = “Arbitrary curve fitting with perceptrons and extended linear regre” readingtime = true +++

Is it possible to determine the best fitting curve to a series of data points just by knowing the form of the function?
